title: new to the game, want to try for a team,(really new or new ranked players who want to win)!discord!

embed.description: Step up your game with a modern voice & text chat app. Crystal clear voice, multiple server and channel support, mobile apps, and more. Get your free server now!

body:
Hello anyone who is reading this. this discord is for people who want to get better at the game. This discord will be used to find people who want to get into the game, are very new to the game. Please use the discord to queue with players like you. If any mid(silver), high-mid(gold) player would like a friend to play with, I will stay on discord and direct mid players with mid player, and noobs with noobs. if anybody is truly want to make a team i will assign people ranked matches. Thank you. [discord](https://discord.gg/Skt3hM)

p.s. im finding a good name for my discord but right now it's going to be RUN infected players
